backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report stub indicating no features listed yet.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry registering the PWA service worker and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy and asset caching for offline use.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing active tab state and rendering layout, tabs, PWA banner, and navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabBar.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with four Hindi-labeled tabs and icon-based tab switching.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing Instagram credit link for The Desi Musafir.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with Hindi header branding, feather icon, and global footer.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Banner prompting users to install the PWA, with iOS and Android-specific instructions.
frontend/src/config/monetization.ts: Centralized WhatsApp contact configuration and helper to generate chat links.
frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts: Defines itinerary data models and full multi-day Dwarka travel plans with optional recommendation cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login state, and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Defines a hook that captures the PWA install prompt event, tracks installability, handles iOS behavior, and exposes prompt and dismiss functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables including custom Dwarka color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/tabs/ConnectivityTab.tsx: Renders transport options from Ahmedabad to Dwarka plus a monetized car/bike rental card with WhatsApp booking.
frontend/src/tabs/RulesTimingsTab.tsx: Displays temple rules, prohibited items, timings, and general guidelines using themed UI components.
frontend/src/tabs/StayFoodTab.tsx: Shows lodging and food options categorized into budget, midâ€‘range, luxury, and best food places using styled cards.
frontend/src/tabs/YatraPlanTab.tsx: React component rendering a Hindi Yatra Plan tab with a day selector and timeline-style itinerary using local hardcoded data. Includes Google Maps links and UI cards for each day's plan.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Utility function that builds a Google Maps search URL for a place in Dwarka by encoding the place name.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Hindi offline-first Dwarka Yatra PWA requirements, current issues, and feature list for planning and fixes.
